A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What an overrated mess. If it wasn't before\, it's most definitely clear now that the Star Wars franchise is a one-trick pony. I won't spoil anything simply because there's nothing to spoil: all the \"big\" reveals are none too interesting\, there are plenty of \"huh?\" moments\, and we get more of the same ol' \"it's your destiny\" crap. SW continues to lack the courage to reach outside its well\, but at least I know better than to buy a ticket for the next movie.
